text: The lesser prairie chicken (Tympanuchus pallidicinctus) is a bird in the grouse family. It is similar to the greater prairie chicken but is slightly smaller and paler in color. About half of this species live in western Kansas. They are also found in Colorado, Oklahoma, New Mexico and Texas. ==References== == Other websites == *BirdLife Species Factsheet *Lesser Prairie-Chicken videos on the Internet Bird Collection Category:Birds of the United States Category:Phasianidae
title: Lesser prairie chicken
